diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $3$.
The length of the line $BC$ is $x$.
The measure of angle $CBA$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $AB$ is $y$.
The lines $BC$ and $AC$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, and $BC$ forming a triangle $ABC$.
